recommended_actions: Temporarily block source IP at network edge.
Enable/verify account lockout policies.
Review targeted accounts for compromise.
Consider MFA enforcement for exposed services.

alerts.title: Suspicious successful logon after burst of failures

Review endpoint telemetry around the success time.

alerts.title: Service account logon observed
alerts.description: A service logon (4624) was observed on VNEVADO-Win11U.vnevado.alpineskihouse.co at 2024-10-18T09:29:31.980000.

evidence_sample.process_name: C:\Program Files\Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection\SenseIR.exe

recommended_actions: Baseline service logons for noise reduction and allow-listing.
